titleStmt.title: A testimonie of the touch-stone, for all professions, and all forms, and gathered churches (as they call them), of what sort soever to try their ground and foundation by and a tryal by the Scriptures, who the false prophets are, which are in the world, which John said should be in the last times / by Margret Fell ; also, some of the ranters principles answered.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
